      • applyAll

        public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot> applyAll(java.util.function.Consumer<com.google.firebase.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot> apply)
        Creates and returns a new OnCompleteListener for use with databaseQueries. Creates a default CompleteListenerWrapper, mainly used for functional interface reasons.
        Parameters:
        apply - The SnapshotApply instance to run code on.
        Returns:
        A new OnCompleteListener

      • find

        public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot> find(java.util.function.Predicate<com.google.firebase.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot> tester,
                                                                                                                java.util.function.Consumer<com.google.firebase.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot> onFound)
        Attempts to find the specified entry from a database query using the supplied methods. This method is an alias for find if you don't care about if the result was not found.
        Parameters:
        tester - The test function to call if the query matches
        onFound - The Consumer to call if the tester returned true
        Returns:
        A new OnCompleteListener

      • find

        public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot> find(java.util.function.Predicate<com.google.firebase.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot> tester,
                                                                                                                java.util.function.Consumer<com.google.firebase.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot> onFound,
                                                                                                                java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Boolean> onNotFound)
        Attempts to find the specified entry from a database query using the supplied methods.
        Parameters:
        tester - The test function to call if the query matches
        onFound - The Consumer to call if the tester returned true
        onNotFound - The Runnable to call if the tester failed to find any, or the query failed The argument will be true if the error was a network error, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        A new OnCompleteListener

      • applyAll

        public static com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot> applyAll(Utils.CompleteListenerWrapper wrapper)
        Creates and returns a new OnCompleteListener for use with databaseQueries using the specified CompleteListenerWrapper
        Parameters:
        wrapper - The CompleteListenerWrapper to use
        Returns:
        A new OnCompleteListener
